result.markdown:
--- title: "I think therefore it's true: The danger of self-perceived objectivity" author: "Priscilla Chen" date: "2025-02-17" categories: [practices] image: "image.jpg" --- ------------------------------------------------------------- read more ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} US_minority_plot <- vl_chart(width = 300, height = 300, title = "US Racial Minority Representation at Calvin")|> vl_mark_line(point = TRUE)|> vl_encode_x("year:Q", title = "")|> vl_scale_x(zero = FALSE, domainMid = 1997, domainMax = 2019)|> vl_encode_y("AHANA_percent:Q", title = "")|> vl_scale_y(domainMax = 30)|> vl_encode_color("student / faculty:N", title = "")|> vl_encode_tooltip_array(list("year", "AHANA_percent"))|> vl_add_data(percentage_minority) US_minority_plot ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ```{=html}
``` ::: ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} minority_plot <- vl_chart(width = 300, height = 300, title = "International and Racial Minority Representation at Calvin (%)")|> vl_mark_line(point = TRUE)|> vl_encode_x("year:Q", title = "")|> vl_scale_x(zero = FALSE, domainMid = 1997, domainMax = 2019)|> vl_encode_y("minority_percent:Q", title = "")|> vl_encode_color("student / faculty:N", title = "")|> vl_encode_tooltip_array(list("year", "AHANA_percent", "International_percent", "minority_percent"))|> vl_add_data(percentage_minority) minority_plot ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ```{=html}
``` ::: ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} race_plot <- vl_hconcat(US_minority_plot, minority_plot) race_plot ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ```{=html}
``` ::: ::: AHANA: students or faculty members who identify themselves as African-, Hispanic-, Asian-, or Native-Americans and are U.S. Citizens or permanent residents of the U.S. ------------------------------------------------------ ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} gender_dif_plot <- vl_chart()|> vl_mark_line(point = TRUE)|> vl_encode_x("year:Q", title = "")|> vl_scale_x(zero = FALSE)|> vl_encode_y("gender_ratio:Q", title = "")|> vl_scale_y(zero = FALSE)|> vl_encode_color("student / faculty:N", title = "")|> vl_add_properties(title = list(text = "Gender Ratio in Calvin Representations", subtitle = "Gender Ratio = Percentage Female / Percentage Male"))|> vl_add_data(percentage_dif) gender_dif_plot ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ```{=html}
``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} reference <- vl_chart()|> vl_mark_line(color = "black")|> vl_encode_x("year:Q", title = "")|> vl_scale_x(zero = FALSE)|> vl_encode_y(value = 1)|> vl_scale_y(rangeMin = 0.3, rangeMax = 1.4)|> vl_add_data(percentage_dif) reference ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ```{=html}
``` ::: ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} line <- vl_chart(width = 300, height = 300)|> vl_mark_bar()|> vl_encode_x("year:Q", title = "")|> vl_scale_x(zero = FALSE)|> vl_encode_y("Female_percent:Q", title = "")|> vl_encode_y2("Male_percent:Q", title = "")|> vl_facet_column("student / faculty:N", title = "")|> vl_add_data(percentage) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` Warning: Invalid schema for object passed to or created by modify_inner_spec.vegaspec_unit ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} line ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ```{=html}
``` ::: ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} percentage <- percentage|> pivot_longer(cols = c("Female_percent", "Male_percent"), values_to = "Percentage", names_to = "Gender") percentage_plot <- vl_chart(width = 300, height = 200)|> vl_mark_line(point = TRUE)|> vl_encode_x("year:Q",title = "")|> vl_encode_y("Percentage:Q")|> vl_encode_color("Gender:N")|> vl_facet_column("student / faculty:N", title = "")|> vl_encode_tooltip_array(list("year", "Gender", "Percentage"))|> vl_add_data(percentage) percentage_plot ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ```{=html}
``` ::: ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} gender_percentage_plot <- vl_chart(width = 300, height = 200)|> vl_mark_line(point = TRUE)|> vl_encode_x("year:Q",title = "")|> vl_encode_y("Percentage:Q", title = "")|> vl_scale_y(zero = FALSE)|> vl_facet_column("Gender:N", title = "")|> vl_encode_color("student / faculty:N", title = "")|> vl_encode_tooltip_array(list("year","student / faculty", "Gender","Percentage"))|> vl_add_properties(title = list(text = "Compare Faculty & Student Representtation: Gender", subtitle = " "))|> vl_add_data(percentage) gender_percentage_plot ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ```{=html}
``` ::: ::: Student body has more female representation than faculty. However, female faculty representation is slightly increasing throughout the recorded years. ---------------------------------------------------------------- ## acknowledgement Calvin University Datasets used above are collected and maintained by [Calvin Institutional Effectiveness & Analytics team](https://calvin.edu/effectiveness-analytics) Dataset: - [Census Day Report](https://calvincollege.sharepoint.com/sites/ReportsandAnalytics/SitePages/Census-Day-Report.aspx). - [US census data on Race and Ethnicity]( https://usafacts.org/data/topics/people-society/population-and-demographics/our-changing-population/)
